dict.array:
cell PSGroupCell label %APP_NAME% isStaticText
cell PSSwitchCell default <%APP_ENABLED%/> defaults io.c0ldra1n.mitsuhaxi-prefs label Enabled key MSH%APP_ID%Enabled alternateColors
cell PSSwitchCell default
defaults io.c0ldra1n.mitsuhaxi-prefs label FFT (frequency instead of amplitude) key MSH%APP_ID%EnableFFT alternateColors
cell PSSwitchCell default
defaults io.c0ldra1n.mitsuhaxi-prefs label Automatically hide the visualizer key MSH%APP_ID%EnableAutoHide alternateColors
cell PSSwitchCell default
defaults io.c0ldra1n.mitsuhaxi-prefs label Dynamic color based on artwork key MSH%APP_ID%EnableDynamicColor alternateColors
cell PSSwitchCell default
defaults io.c0ldra1n.mitsuhaxi-prefs label New color calculation method (experimental!) key MSH%APP_ID%EnableNewColor alternateColors
cell PSStaticTextCell label Dynamic color alpha
cell PSSliderCell label Dynamic color alpha default 0.6 defaults io.c0ldra1n.mitsuhaxi-prefs key MSH%APP_ID%DynamicColorAlpha min 0.1 max 1 showValue
isSegmented
%EXTRA%
cell PSLinkCell cellClass PFSimpleLiteColorCell libcolorpicker
defaults io.c0ldra1n.mitsuhaxi-colors key MSH%APP_ID%WaveColor fallback %APP_COLOR% alpha
label Wave color
cell PSStaticTextCell label Wave offset (top)
cell PSSliderCell label Wave offset (top) defaults io.c0ldra1n.mitsuhaxi-prefs key MSH%APP_ID%WaveOffset min -150 max 150 showValue
isSegmented
cell PSStaticTextCell label Visualizer speed/frames per second
cell PSSliderCell label Visualizer speed/frames per second default 24 defaults io.c0ldra1n.mitsuhaxi-prefs key MSH%APP_ID%Fps min 5 max 240 showValue
isSegmented
cell PSStaticTextCell label Sensitivity
cell PSSliderCell label Sensitivity default 1 defaults io.c0ldra1n.mitsuhaxi-prefs key MSH%APP_ID%Sensitivity min 0.25 max 4 showValue
isSegmented
cell PSSwitchCell default
defaults io.c0ldra1n.mitsuhaxi-prefs label Battery saver (may cause wave freezing) key MSH%APP_ID%EnableBatterySaver alternateColors
cell PSGroupCell footerText MitsuhaXI isStaticText
cell PSGroupCell footerText Mitsuha, Mitsuha2 by c0ldra1n,$ ported to iOS 11 by Nepeta. isStaticText
